DESCRIPTION: DPF – Dummy Poly2 Fill

Use PMNDMY mark layer to exclude dummy Poly2 generation in

Certain critical analog/RF areas.

Dummy Poly2 is generated on top of dummy COMP by sizing up the 

Dummy COMP by 0.3um per side. The size of the dummy

poly2 is 5.6 umX 5.6um square, and generated in prime die (1).
Space between dummy poly2 (for drawing algorithm).

Resulted minimum space between Dummy poly in all directions

(for DRC check)
Stagger both X and Y direction
Space of dummy poly2 to COMP
Space of dummy poly2 to poly2
Space of dummy poly2 to Nwell boundary
Space of dummy poly2 to DNWELL boundary
Space of dummy poly2 to LVPWELL boundary
Space of dummy poly2 to Dualgate boundary
Space from dummy poly2 in prime die to scribe line
Space from dummy poly2 to Resistor marking layer (RES_MK).
Space of dummy poly2 to Pad
Remove truncated dummy squares
Space to dummy COMP exclude layer
Space of dummy poly2 fill to active circuit metal1 (2)
Space of dummy poly2 fill to active circuit metal2 (2)
Minimum dummy poly2 space to IND_MK layer
Dummy poly2 should not exist under IND_MK layer
Minimum dummy poly2 space to MTPMARK layer
Dummy poly2 should not exist under MTPMARK layer
Dummy poly2 cannot exit under the marking layer “PMNDMY”

Space from dummy poly2 to dummy poly2 excluding layer

(PMNDMY) (2)
